brief_description: The scheme aims to provide a subsidy per unit for purchasing insulated vehicles for the beneficiaries to promote cold-chain logistics in fish transportation.
detailed_description: The "Insulated Vehicle" scheme was launched by the Ministry Of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying, Government of India, under the umbrella scheme "Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana". It aims to promote efficient and hygienic fish transportation systems. Under this scheme, a financial grant is provided to the beneficiaries for purchasing insulated (reefer) vehicles used in fish transportation. It seeks to minimize post-harvest losses, improve fish value chains, and enhance earnings of fish farmers by enabling cold-chain logistics.
benefits: Financial grant of up to ₹20,00,000/- per unit for the purchase of an insulated (reefer) vehicle.
40% of the unit cost for general category beneficiaries. 60% of the unit cost for Scheduled Caste (SC) and women beneficiaries.

Subsidy is applicable for one vehicle per beneficiary only. Central assistance is released only after initiating fishery activity. The applicant should agree that any losses in procurement, operation, or maintenance are their own responsibility, and not that of the Government of India or Haryana.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant should be a fish farmer. The applicant must possess a Family Identity Card (Parivar Pehchan Patra). The applicant must ensure that the fish transportation facility is maintained in working condition. The applicant must not have availed a grant for a similar insulated (reefer) vehicle earlier.
